column4: i'm going to be using my Ubuntu system as a server (web, database, etc) and as a PVR if i can get my tvtuner working. in general: KDE or Gnome? axp 2800+, 512mb ram, voodoo3, tvtuner
use XFCE :P hahahah its lighter and works better... but to each their own
does it have apps to support MythTV, and other assorted things?
